com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql

Interface DatabaseCopyOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseCopyOperationsImpl

    public interface DatabaseCopyOperations
    Represents the SQL Database Management API includes operations for managing SQL Server database copies for a subscription.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DatabaseCopyCreateResponse create(String serverName, String databaseName, DatabaseCopyCreateParameters parameters)
      Starts a SQL Server database copy.
      Future<DatabaseCopyCreateResponse> createAsync(String serverName, String databaseName, DatabaseCopyCreateParameters parameters)
      Starts a SQL Server database copy.
      OperationResponse delete(String serverName, String databaseName, String databaseCopyName)
      Stops a SQL Server database copy.
      Future<OperationResponse> deleteAsync(String serverName, String databaseName, String databaseCopyName)
      Stops a SQL Server database copy.
      DatabaseCopyGetResponse get(String serverName, String databaseName, String databaseCopyName)
      Retrieves information about a SQL Server database copy.

      Retrieves information about a SQL Server database copy.
      DatabaseCopyListResponse list(String serverName, String databaseName)
      Retrieves the list of SQL Server database copies for a database.

      Updates a SQL Server database copy.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        DatabaseCopyCreateResponse create(String serverName,
                                  String databaseName,
                                  DatabaseCopyCreateParameters parameters)
                           throws ParserConfigurationException,
                                  SAXException,
                                  TransformerException,
                                  IOException,
                                  ServiceException
        Starts a SQL Server database copy.
        Parameters:
        serverName - Required. The name of the SQL Server where the source database resides.
        databaseName - Required. The name of the source database.
        parameters - Required. The additional parameters for the create database copy operation.
        Returns:
        Represents a response to the create request.
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was an error configuring the parser for the response body.
        SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the response body.
        TransformerException - Thrown if there was an error creating the DOM transformer.
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.

      • createAsync

        Future<DatabaseCopyCreateResponse> createAsync(String serverName,
                                               String databaseName,
                                               DatabaseCopyCreateParameters parameters)

        Parameters:

      • delete

        OperationResponse delete(String serverName,
                         String databaseName,
                         String databaseCopyName)
                  throws IOException,
                         ServiceException
        Stops a SQL Server database copy.
        Parameters:
        serverName - Required. The name of the source or destination SQL Server instance.
        databaseName - Required. The name of the database.
        databaseCopyName - Required. The unique identifier for the database copy to stop.
        Returns:
        A standard service response including an HTTP status code and request ID.
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.

                            String databaseName,
                            String databaseCopyName)
                     throws IOException,
                            ServiceException,
                            ParserConfigurationException,
                            SAXException
        Retrieves information about a SQL Server database copy.
        Parameters:
        serverName - Required. The name of the source or destination SQL Server instance.
        databaseName - Required. The name of the database.
        databaseCopyName - Required. The unique identifier for the database copy to retrieve.
        Returns:
        Represents a response to the get request.
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was a serious configuration error with the document parser.
        SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the XML response.

                              String databaseName)
                       throws IOException,
                              ServiceException,
                              ParserConfigurationException,
                              SAXException
        Retrieves the list of SQL Server database copies for a database.
        Parameters:
        serverName - Required. The name of the database server to be queried.
        databaseName - Required. The name of the database to be queried.
        Returns:
        Represents the response containing the list of database copies for a given database.
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was a serious configuration error with the document parser.
        SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the XML response.
